data.text: @MKSerumaga @Aisha_Kabanda @NUP_Ug @LoP_Uganda @MathiasMpuuga @JNambeshe @HEBobiwine Museveni said we are still lucky cause his Fisher W/men are still using the stolen money to construct 5star hotels so let us not threaten then
@MKSerumaga @Aisha_Kabanda @NUP_Ug @LoP_Uganda @MathiasMpuuga @JNambeshe @HEBobiwine Sad to admit but NUP collected slot of chuff along the way.
@MKSerumaga @Aisha_Kabanda @NUP_Ug @LoP_Uganda @MathiasMpuuga @JNambeshe @HEBobiwine No surprises here, accountability remains a dream in Uganda...
@MKSerumaga @Aisha_Kabanda @NUP_Ug @LoP_Uganda @MathiasMpuuga @JNambeshe @HEBobiwine Accountability and Service. Is our priority.
@MKSerumaga I told u, I doubt kabanda
@MKSerumaga @Aisha_Kabanda @NUP_Ug @LoP_Uganda @MathiasMpuuga @JNambeshe @HEBobiwine Read it as selective committee at first.

Most of the research projects that had received funds for COVID-19 Vaccines and Treatments had not made much progress. Delays were majorly attributed to the late disbursement of funds and delayed delivery of Equipment. ~ Auditor General's Report June 2021. https://t.co/e6PJcx54kN
@NinyeCollinz @NUP_Ug @Aisha_Kabanda @LoP_Uganda @MathiasMpuuga @JNambeshe @HEBobiwine The Select Committee was supposed to report to @Parliament_Ug 14 days from 10th November 2021.
@MKSerumaga @NUP_Ug @Aisha_Kabanda @LoP_Uganda @MathiasMpuuga @JNambeshe @HEBobiwine What circumstances did they fail to report?
@MKSerumaga @NUP_Ug @Aisha_Kabanda @LoP_Uganda @MathiasMpuuga @JNambeshe @HEBobiwine Leave my sister alone. She never saw such money
